competitors.name: Amazon DynamoDB
competitors.notes: Best overall MongoDB alternative - fully managed NoSQL service

competitors.name: Couchbase
competitors.notes: Distributed document store with powerful search engine

competitors.name: Redis
competitors.notes: In-memory data store for extreme speed

competitors.name: ArangoDB
competitors.notes: Native multi-model database supporting document, graph, and key-value

competitors.name: Apache Cassandra
competitors.notes: Open-source NoSQL database for high availability

competitors.name: CockroachDB
competitors.notes: Distributed SQL database with strong consistency

competitors.name: PostgreSQL
competitors.notes: Traditional relational database with robust JSON support

competitors.name: Amazon DocumentDB
competitors.notes: MongoDB-compatible managed document database from AWS

context: By 2020, MongoDB faced an increasingly competitive landscape with both NoSQL alternatives and managed database services. Cloud providers had introduced MongoDB-compatible services like Amazon DocumentDB.
